## Description
&#10;&#9;&#9;Bleaching chemical include chlorine dioxide, oxygen, or hydrogen peroxide. 

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Chemical|
|Form:|Liquid|
